EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2021FY-LEAD-GEN-FOLLOW-UP-PROGRAM.Trevor - 3B
EmailTemplate.subject: Embrace the Rise of Virtual Care: Teladoc Health
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Hello}},
I am Trevor Garrison with Teladoc Health, and I want to thank you for your interest in Teladoc Health. As a follow-up and for your review, I'm sharing a Teladoc Health Experience Video (https://view.highspot.com/viewer/603d74f8659e936f2a89e076) (90 seconds).
For the opportunity to ask any initial questions you may have, feel free to directly schedule our 15-minute call here: https://calendly.com/trevorgarrison/introduction?utm_campaign=atmd-lead-outreach&utm_medium=email&utm_source=marketo&utm_content=email-3b
Learn more about Teladoc Health benefits: • Comprehensive care — Telehealth Services can resolve a broad array of needs, including general medical services, mental healthcare, dermatology and more. • Convenience — Members have 24/7 access by web, phone, or our award-winning mobile app. • Clinical quality — The U.S. board-certified physicians in our network have an average of 20 years' experience and deliver the highest quality care.
In good health, Trevor
Trevor Garrison Lead Development Representative Teladoc Health, Inc.
O (612) 999-7525 tgarrison@teladochealth.com
